translations: n.跳线；[服装]连衫裤童装；跳跃者（jumper 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Three famous jumpers were they, as everyone would say, when they all met together in the room.
sentences.translation: 当他们都在一个房间里集合起来，大家都会说他们三个是著名的跳高运动员。

sentences.sentence: My jumpers not falling, my dribbles not sure.
sentences.translation: 跳投不利落，运球没把握。

sentences.sentence: The man must have done something right, more right than all jumpers before.
sentences.translation: 这个人一定是做了些很对的事，比所有以前跳高的做得更对。
